extension.name: Conditional Fields
extension.description: Allows the specification of conditional display of fields
extension.comments:
This is an alpha release of the conditional fields extension. Some architectural changes will probably occur before an official release. A future stable release (although not necessarily the first) will include a user interface for specifying the conditions and will store them in the database rather than in flat files.
In this alpha, the conditions will be stored in JSON format in JavaScript files.
